About.title: Sampurasun!
About.name: Mochamad Aldi Akbar Suanda
About.desc: IT Support sareng Machine Learning Developer, Abdi kagungan kahoyong kanggo diajar dina ngembangkeun teknologi nyaeta dina aplikasi web. panginten abdi tiasa ngarengsekeun sadaya siklus ngembangkeun parabot lunak tina ngembangkeun tampilan dugikeun manajemen database sinareng logika server.

Project.desc: Project Learning is sure to be updated as technology evolves.
